item.title: Google Summer of Code 2018
item.description: The clock struck 9:30 pm IST on 23th April, 2018. I had been extremely impatient for this day since I submitted my proposal for Google Summer of Code on 27th March 2018. I checked my dashboard on the GSoC website and it showed my status as Active. I was flummoxed after seeing it, as I did not really know what to comprehend - Am I selected ? or Am I not ?
